author: smartini
msg: PIVOT-895, PIVOT-912, for Jenkins build jobs (both for 2.0.x maintenance branch, and for trunk 2.1.0)

author: juanpablo
msg: * JSPWIKI-799: jenkins build fails because of SearchManagerTest. It was reusing the same page directory
as other tests, indexing pages created on other tests, depending on the test execution order.
* Use of Lucene 4.4 *Fields on LuceneSearchProvider to instantiate Fields, instead of using deprecated

author: juanpablo
msg: - JSPWIKI-799: use of custom jspwiki.fileSystemProvider.pageDir to make this test independent from JSPWikiMarkupParserTest and CommandResolverTest executions
- workdir generated inside target/test-classes, to avoid leaving temp files on build nodes

author: juanpablo
msg: use of Lucene 4.4 *Fields on LuceneSearchProvider to instantiate Fields, instead of using deprecated constructor + Field.Index

author: hossman
msg: SOLR-4952: TestSolrDeletionPolicy1 can't directly use solrconfig.snippet.randomindexconfig.xml - but it can leverage the random sys props directly (merge r1511128)
